issue.title: [Rust] Remove `BufferBuilderTrait` and associated Result requirement.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11038](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11038). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The trait is no longer used, as we completely split the build of boolean and non-boolean buffers, and the purpose of that trait was to support multiple implementations of the buffer building.

 

This trait also has `Result` for infallible methods.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11038?focusedCommentId=17255232) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9017
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9017>
